cast.overview: Charley Brewster, a high school student, accidentally discovers the true and creepy nature of Jerry Dandrige, his dashing and enigmatic new neighbor; but no one seems willing to believe him.
cast.title: Fright Night

details.biography: Heidi Sorenson is a Canadian actress. She was born on August 5, 1960 to Danish immigrant parents in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada. Her father ran a fishing company. Sorenson has two sisters. Heidi graduated from West Vancouver High School. At age seventeen, she got a job as a junior accountant at a local radio station. Heidi was spotted by a scout for "Playboy" magazine after winning a local bikini contest. Sorenson was the Playmate of the Month in the July, 1981 issue of "Playboy". Heidi subsequently became a member of the "Singing Playmates" musical group and continued to pose for additional pictorials for "Playboy" well into her thirties.
details.name: Heidi Sorenson
